## Sheet Safety Checklist
- [ ] Only writes to documented columns (Category, Note, Tags, __mobile_app_id)
- [ ] Never overwrites formulas
- [ ] Validates schema before writes
- [ ] Handles missing columns gracefully
- [ ] Uses column names, not positions

## Code Quality Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the Swift style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] No force unwrapping in production code
- [ ] No sensitive data logged
